title: (x) Pantone logo - Akzidenz grotesk {Jonathan}
content:
Hey there   
Does anyone know the typeface used for the Pantone® logo???   
   
Please help!   
   
Mark   
CPH, Denmark
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Humm, I think is Myriad.   
   
Ricardo

Jonathan is correct. They changed it a couple of years ago. You can see it on [the Pantone® website](http://web.archive.org/web/20130721013718/http:/www.pantone.com/) and on all the latest swatch books. For a while before that it was Myriad, as Ricardo says.
the typeface used in the PANTONE® logo is FRUTIGER !!! : )
